sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The XFce package contains xfce-mcs-manager, xfce4-about, xfce-setting-show, xfce4-panel, xfdesktop, xfhelp4, xflock4, xfmountdev4, xfrun4, xfsamba4, xftaskbar4, xfterm4, xftrash4, xftree4, xfwm4 and libxfce4mcs, libxfce4util, and libxfcegui4 libraries.

sect3.title: xfce-mce-manager
sect3.para: xfce-mce-manager is the settings manager for XFce.

sect3.title: xfce-setting-show
sect3.para: xfce_setting-show displays the settings for XFce.

sect3.title: xfce4-panel
sect3.para: xfce4-panel is the panel manager for XFce. It contains the launcher, clock, mail check, desktop switcher and separator programs.

sect3.title: xfdesktop
sect3.para: xfdesktop is the desktop manager for XFce.

sect3.title: xfhelp4
sect3.para: xfhelp4 is script that launches a HTML browser to display online documentation.

sect3.title: xflock4
sect3.para: xflock4 is a script used to lock the current screen during drag and drop actions.

sect3.title: xfmountdev4
sect3.para: xfmountdev4 mounts a device on the specified mount point and launches xftree4, then unmounts the device when xftree4 finishes.

sect3.title: xfrun4
sect3.para: xfrun4 is the program launcher for XFce.

sect3.title: xfsamba4
sect3.para: xfsamba4 is Samba front end for XFce.

sect3.title: xftaskbar4
sect3.para: xftaskbar4 is the taskbar manager for XFce.

sect3.title: xfterm4
sect3.para: xfterm4 is a small terminal wrapper to be used as a drag and drop action for the XFce front panel.

sect3.title: xftrash4
sect3.para: xftrash4 is a small script to be used as a drag and drop action for the XFce front panel.

sect3.title: xftree4
sect3.para: xftree4 is the file manager for XFce.

sect3.title: xfwm4
sect3.para: xfwm4 is a window manager for X11.
